testcase.name: STOA Portal > should pass a basic test
certificateValidator > validateCertificate > should return valid result for valid certificate
certificateValidator > validateCertificate > should return invalid result for invalid certificate
certificateValidator > validateCertificate > should handle network errors gracefully
certificateValidator > validateCertificate > should handle API errors with detail message
certificateValidator > validateSubscriptionRequest > should validate subscription without certificate
certificateValidator > validateSubscriptionRequest > should validate subscription with valid certificate
certificateValidator > validateSubscriptionRequest > should fail subscription with invalid certificate
certificateValidator > validateSubscriptionRequest > should include warnings from certificate validation
certificateValidator > formatCertificateDate > should format date correctly
certificateValidator > getCertificateStatusColor > should return red for expired certificate
certificateValidator > getCertificateStatusColor > should return amber for soon-to-expire certificate
certificateValidator > getCertificateStatusColor > should return green for valid certificate
certificateValidator > getCertificateStatusIcon > should return error for expired
certificateValidator > getCertificateStatusIcon > should return warning for expires soon
certificateValidator > getCertificateStatusIcon > should return success for valid
